title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Convex Front, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Serving Table with Convex Front
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
signed: Watermark across verso bottom : ORIENTAL LINEN
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right corner: Serving Table; inscribed in graphite, upper right of image, with arrow pointing to right corner of table top: inlay; below, illegible and half-erased inscription
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oblong  top with convex front having 2 drawers and raised on 4 straight tapering legs; 2 conforming shelves attach below; low backsplash with horizontal patera medallion center.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Convex Front, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-67
